channel.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server]~[RE-OPENED] Hurry! Apply today!
channel.description:
[center][url=http://definitivex.netai.net][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zydcup.png[/img][/url][/center] [center][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/97i8v8.png[/img] [size=10pt]Welcome to [b]Definitive X[/b] Development Team [i][b]I have not been doing anything at all, for a very long time, So I thought I would start again![/b][/i][/size]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img] [b]Base:[/b] [i]Shards[/i] [b]Sub-Base:[/b] [i]CreativeScape[/i] Don't know what[i] CreativeScape[/i] is? [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440915.0.html]Click Here.[/url]
My name is Danny, I have been coding server's for about 4 years now, and just this year i started with Shards. I've been thinking of creating Development Thread for a long while now, so here I am today, making a Development Thread!
[u][b]A couple goals for this server are:[/b][/u] • Make a Rs-2006 server, but with a unique custom vibe, that is both unlike Rs it's self, but also unlike any other Rs Private Server. • Make a stable server that is always online, always stable, no dupes, cheats, glitches, bugs or anything of that sort. • Make sure that no matter what kind of player you are, whether pure, or skill, you will be able to make money, have fun, and always have something to do. • Most of all, BE SUCCESSFUL! This will [i]not[/i] be a donators-rule server. There will be memberships that last for one month. These members will have their own area in the world, and in that area there will be easier ways to train, both skilling levels and combat levels; there will be extra monsters for them, and so on. This will be a runescape-like server, but with those extra features that [i]rsps's[/i] have, (like commands, easier training, easier money-making, etc.). We will have a RS Classic website [i]with[/i] a forum. (In a couple days).
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img]
Home is in Port Phasmatys, although we call it "Ghost-Town", or just simply "Home".
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29mmyr6.png[/img]
Added [b]a lot[/b] of doors, stairs, npcs/shops. • Everything [i]CreativeScape[/i] has, we have. • When we get a proper team going, there will be a load of features! So just wait a lil bit.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/dpv1uw.png[/img][/center]
[center]Finished Home. All Npc Shops and Dialogues in home area are complete. [/center]
[center][size=12pt][u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u][/size] (more coming soon).
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/4r52yx.png[/img] This is an old picture.[/center]
[size=14pt][b]Team:[/b][/size]
High Administrator: 1/1 Gfx: 0/2 coders: 1/3 Admin: 0/1 moderator: 0/3 Web Designer/Developer: 1/1
[code]Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Years with Java: (Only Coders need to fill this out Java knowledge?(1/10): Only Coders need to fill this out Proof of any work?: Only Coders need to fill this out)[/code]
I support all compliments and/or criticism so please comment.
[right]-Dfx .[/right]

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server]~[RE-OPENED] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Applying for?: Admin/Moderator/Graphics

Why should we choose you?: Experienced, Professional, Helpful, and all around good person. I work to better a community to my best of my ability, but also work to make sure my team is working together as well.

Will you stay dedicated?: I wouldn’t have time for anything else.

Age: 17

Do you think you can get along with other staff?: It’s a large goal of mine to keep the staff team working together, and in communication with each other.

How many hours a day are you usually on?: I normally play/study/browse at work, then I come home and do the same. There’s hardly any time I’m not online.*

*If you would like an actual number I would approximate 14+/- hours.

** Also I notice my application is shorter than most. Feel free to skype/Msn me whenever available for any more information, or to simply talk.
Skype: Call_Me_Aaron
MSN: xxaaronxx46@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server]~[RE-OPENED] Hurry! Apply today!

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server]~[RE-OPENED] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @Zonebird Zonebird
item.description:
@Zonebird wrote:

Applying for?: Admin

My (Real Name): Anthony, Prefer (Tony)

Why should we choose you?: I am basically on each day on my pc and I wanna get chosen so i can help out the members in Definitive X and help with mod’s and the forums basically and do suggestions for the server like new shops economy reset or something similar to that. I also well be very dedicated to the forums and help out with appeal bans and mutes or even with arguments that go on in-game and the forums. I well put money toward the server like 5.00 Dollars monthly for the VPS Payments that the owner has to pay each and every month.

Will you stay dedicated?: Yes, i well try my best to stay dedicated each and every day on the server to help out users on Definitive X And moderate the moderator team and see how much work they are doing on the server each day like I am.

Age: 16

Do you think you can get along with other staff?: I well truly get along with the other staff because im friendly and helpful to anyone that needs help around the community. Example: if a mod gets in a argument with another mod ill try to get in it and stop what is going on and tell them to explain to me what has happened and ill try to sort it out so were all friends again and we can get back to what we were doing and helping people out.

How many hours a day are you usually on?: Depending on the days but mostly, 6-8 hours weeks and 10 hours weekends.

Thanks for reading my application and i hope you like it.

Read full topic

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server]~[RE-OPENED] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Applying for?: Coder
Why should we choose you?: I am super confident person and won’t let anything in my way to stop coding. Yes, I do have 3 other servers to work on, but sure, why not add a 4th? I can help very willingly and won’t stop helping until the absolute finish. On the forums: On the forums I love to see a neat topic, maybe I could make the announcements?
Will you stay dedicated?:Surely yes.
Age: 11 (No troll, this is true.)
Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Of course! I have never said a cuss word in my life besides one in this forums.
How many hours a day are you usually on?: 2 - 5 hours
Years with Java: 2
Java knowledge?(1/10): 3 1/2
Proof of any work?: Check out my profile.

Read full topic

item.title: «Definitive X» [Stunning & Unique server]~[RE-OPENED] Hurry! Apply today!
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Applying for?: GFX/Web Coder (if the spot ever becomes available.)

Why should we choose you?: I am all for promoting this server and helping is succeed! // Would love to be apart of something on the path to success. // I am willing to dedicate time and experience into doing a worthy job.

Will you stay dedicated?: Of course, as long as I feel the server is doing the right thing. (Not breaking rules, harassing the community, selling staff positions, etc)

Age: 16, 17 in a few months.

Do you think you can get along with other staff?: I take my position seriously and often I am very serious about what is going on. I have never had known problems with any staff on any board.

How many hours a day are you usually on?: I am on normally 17+ hours.

Read full topic
